sentences.en: ‘I could ask the same thing of you,’ she countered.
sentences.cn: “我也可以同样要求你。”她反驳道。

sentences.en: [as modifier]an under-the-counter deal.
sentences.cn: 偷偷摸摸的非法买卖。

sentences.en: [as modifier]over-the-counter medicines.
sentences.cn: 非处方药。

sentences.en: A wind-up clock ticked busily from the kitchen counter.
sentences.cn: 一只上了弦的钟在厨房的案子上嘀嗒响个不停。

sentences.en: hard porn is legally banned, but still available under the counter.
sentences.cn: 赤裸裸的淫秽作品是明令禁止的，但仍可私下买到。

sentences.en: He conceded that second-hand accounts are leading to rumour and counter-rumour.
sentences.cn: 他承认道听途说会引发谣言和辟谣。

sentences.en: He could just about see the little man behind the counter.
sentences.cn: 他勉强能看到柜台后面的小个子男人。

sentences.en: He gave his counter a polish with a soft duster.
sentences.cn: 他用软抹布擦亮了自己的柜台。

sentences.en: He slammed the counter with the flat of his hand.
sentences.cn: 他用手掌使劲拍打着柜台。

sentences.en: He was determined to counter the bribery allegations.
sentences.cn: 他决心要反驳受贿的指控。

sentences.en: He wondered if the girl behind the counter recognised him.
sentences.cn: 他在想柜台后面的那个女孩是否认出了他。

sentences.en: His patriarchal generosity is counter-balanced by his ruthlessness.
sentences.cn: 他有着族长式的慷慨大方，同时却又冷漠无情。

sentences.en: If you have only mild symptoms, try an over-the-counter treatment.
sentences.cn: 如果症状较轻，试试用非处方药来治疗。

sentences.en: It is counter-productive to address an interviewee in patronizing tones.
sentences.cn: 以盛气凌人的语气同面试者讲话将会适得其反。

sentences.en: Set the video counter to zero before you press play.
sentences.cn: 在按播放键之前，把录像机上的计数器调到零。

sentences.en: She sighed and flicked a dishcloth at the counter.
sentences.cn: 她叹了一口气，然后用洗碗布轻掸着柜台。

sentences.en: She spread pieces of bread on the counter and began buttering them.
sentences.cn: 她把几片面包摆在台上，开始抹黄油。

sentences.en: She wheeled sharply and headed for the check-out counter.
sentences.cn: 她突然转身，朝收银台走去。

sentences.en: Some actions by the authorities ran counter to the President’s call for leniency.
sentences.cn: 当局的某些行为和总统呼吁的宽容背道而驰。

sentences.en: The army began its counter-attack this morning.
sentences.cn: 军队今早发起了反攻。

sentences.en: The army now appears to have launched a counter-offensive.
sentences.cn: 军队现在似乎已经发起了反攻。

sentences.en: The finding ran counter to all expectations.
sentences.cn: 该发现出乎所有人的预料。

sentences.en: The shop assistant received me indifferently while leaning on a counter.
sentences.cn: 商店售货员靠在柜台上漫不经心地招呼我。

words.tran_cn: 反作用的；抵抗的；反对的
中和；反对的行动；抵抗；反动
强硬的抗议；反向气流；猛烈的反对
[数][电子][核][计量]计数器，计算器；[贸易]柜台；计算者

phrases.tran_cn: 站柜台；（在商店或银行）作服务员
补偿贸易；相向贸易；反信风
往相反方向追猎；背道而驰
粒子计数器；粒子计数管；颗粒测量计数器
售票台；售票柜台；票务处
私下出售的；暗中作成的；违法的；走后门
（一般指非法的买卖）偷偷地；私下地

trans.tran_en: to be the opposite of something
to be the opposite of something

trans.tran_cn: 柜台，工作台，对立面，计数器，筹码，反驳
trans.tran_en: the place where you pay or are served in a shop, bank, restaurant etc
to say something in order to try to prove that what someone said was not true or as a reply to something
